text: [ videowaywire video _ id = ” 329477BB7D450D3D ” ] * In what could double as a storyline for the upcoming season of “ Insecure, ” co - stars Sarunas J. Jackson and Dominique Perry just had a baby together, and it came as a complete surprise to the woman Jackson was dating at the time. Jackson, who plays Dro on the show, welcomed a baby girl with Perry, who plays Tasha. On Tuesday, she shared a black and white photo of her newborn daughter, Zen, lying in a hospital crib. “ ” Zen ” …. you ’ re so perfect … thank you God for appointing me the wonderful job of being her mommy?, ” Perry wrote in the caption.
